meanings.sent1: Her undenied talent for painting impressed everyone at the art show.
meanings.sent2: The undenied fact that the sun rises in the east is well-known.
meanings.sent3: It was undenied that the cat wearing a tiny hat was the highlight of the party.
meanings.sent4: The undenied beauty of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The undenied truth of his words resonated with the audience.

meanings.sent1: The undenied importance of education is evident in every society.
meanings.sent2: His undenied commitment to his work earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent3: It was undenied that the dancing penguin stole the show at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The undenied impact of her speech moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent5: The undenied value of friendship is priceless.
